overview:
Ozonion optimizes and improves the whole on line advertising funnel.

All advertising methods are not responsible for conversions. In order to maximize your conversion rates customers need specific landing pages to close the advertising cycle. Each advertising campaign requires a specific landing page, tailored and tested to convert a strictly defined segmented visitors. The landing page is the first and best chance to turn a visitor into a customer.

Landing pages not only convert customers, they also indicate how well a marketing campaign is performing. By tracking how many conversions take place from the unique landing pages, companies know if their Internet marketing campaign is a success or needs some adjusting.

Ozonion automatic generates tons of creatives and landing pages that aggregate and rotate dozens of Call2Action, backgrounds, splash and images that make them more relevant to the content they carry. Ozonion platform instantly matches all the approved creative elements and randomly builds a large number of page combinations for the same product, delivering just the high performing pages.
